text: Knœrsheim (; Alsatian: Knersche) is a commune. It is in Grand Est in the Bas- Rhin department in northeast France. == Geography == Knœrsheim is placed about to the southeast of Saverne. Neighbouring communes are Westhouse-Marmoutier to the north, Zeinheim to the east, Rangen to the southeast, Zehnacker to the south and Jetterswiller to the west. == Sights == * The church of Saint Michel == Related pages == * Communes of the Bas-Rhin department == References == Category:Communes in Bas-Rhin
title: Knœrsheim
